name: HolaHatha 2, 3, 5, 8, and 10 Pound Neoprene Dumbbell Free Hand Weight Set with Rack, Ideal for Home Exercises to Gain Tone and Definition, Pastel
short_description: Strength Training Exercise Equipment: Dumbbell set includes 7 pairs of comfortable hand weights adding up to 146 pounds total, ideal for a wide range of resistance training exercises to tone and build muscles
Reliable Free Weights: Hexagonal design of the dumbbell heads stops the weights from rolling, ensuring they remain stable and secure when placed down
Non-Slip Grip: Vibrant neoprene coating on the weights allows for easy identification, while the contoured handles provide a non-slip, comforting grip during every exercise
Home Gym Storage Rack: Equipped with a weight stand, providing a convenient storage solution to keep your strength training workout equipment organized in your home gym

Includes: Set includes (2) 3-pound, (2) 5-pound, (2) 8-pound, (2) 10-pound, (2) 12-pound, (2) 15-pound, and (2) 20-pound dumbbell weights for fitness enthusiasts of all levels for ultimate customization
product_description: Level up your home gym exercise equipment with the HolaHatha 146-Pound Dumbbell Set, a comprehensive and colorful weight collection tailored to elevate your strength and conditioning workouts. This versatile set is a great addition to your home setup, offering a diverse range of dumbbell weights to accommodate a wide variety of exercises. Whether you're into lunges, kickbacks, bicep curls, cardio routines, or more, this set ensures your fitness regimen never becomes monotonous. Carefully crafted to fit comfortably in smaller hands, these free weights are an ideal choice for those who struggle with larger handles. The non-slip neoprene coating and hex-shaped ends provide a secure grip even when you're perspiring profusely, preventing any accidental slips, or rolling while in use. These dumbbells are engineered for long-term durability, crafted from premium materials, ensuring they can withstand the rigors of your daily workouts. This complete kit includes a handy storage dumbbell rack, allowing you to keep your workout equipment neatly organized when not in use. The multicolored set comprises (2) 3-pound, (2) 5-pound, (2) 8-pound, (2) 10-pound, (2) 12-pound, (2) 15-pound, and (2) 20-pound dumbbell weights, providing you with comprehensive range to suit your evolving fitness needs. Whether your goal is to gain tone and definition or simply maintain an active lifestyle, these dumbbells are designed with your exercise enjoyment in mind. Elevate your fitness journey at home with the HolaHatha 146-Pound Dumbbell Weight Set, designed to empower you in achieving your fitness goals while making your workouts enjoyable and effective.

name: CAP 150 LB Rubber Coated Hex Dumbbell Hand Weight Set with Vertical Storage Rack - Chrome Handle | Green Rack
short_description: SET INCLUDES – A pair of 5-pound, 10-pound, 15-pound, 20-pound, and 25-pound rubber hex dumbbells with a green A-frame dumbbell rack to store the weights. E-commerge packaging. This set ships in multiple boxes.

SPACE-SAVING DESIGN – The A-frame design of this rack maximizes floor space by storing dumbbells in an “A” shape, or vertical fashion. Easily access and store dumbbells. Rubber inserts prevent dumbbells and rack from scratches

DURABLE AND RELIABLE – Rack is made with steel and finished with durable black powder coat. Heads are made from ASTM A48 Class 20 grey iron and joined together by a 1018 cold rolled solid steel handle (sizes 15-120lb) with an extreme durable rubber coating.
VERSATILE – Dumbbells offer the ability to target specific muscle groups or perform a full body workout. Perfect for isolations, functional and HIIT workouts, and strength training routines
FEATURES – The original hex shaped heads prevent rolling. The medium depth knurling on the handle provides essential grip and security during use. Rubber coating is a durable and effective finish
product_description: The CAP 150 LB Coated Hex Dumbbell Weight Set with Green A-Frame Rack will add versatility, storage space, and reliability to your home gym. This set includes a pair of 5-pound, 10-pound, 15-pound, 20-pound, and 25-pound rubber hex dumbbell weights and an A-frame rack to store them. The FIVE pairs of dumbbells can be easily stored and accessed using the reliable, durable, space-saving A-frame rack. The dumbbell heads are made from ASTM A48 Class 20 grey iron coated in 80 shore hardness rubber joined together by a solid 1018 cold rolled steel chromed handle, making them durable and reliable. Use dumbbells to target specific muscle groups or add resistance to your strength training routine or HIIT workout. This set allows you to start with light resistance and build your way up to heavier weights, allowing you to attain the fitness goals you’ve set.

PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION: Each dumbbell features a solid cast iron core encased in high-density virgin rubber that protects floors while resisting cracking over time.
SAFE HEXAGONAL DESIGN: The hex-shaped heads provide stability during exercises by preventing rolling while enabling space-efficient storage.
ERGONOMIC HANDLES: The chrome-plated steel handles of the dumbbells provide a comfortable, non-slip grip (28-34mm diameter) for optimal comfort during all lifting motions and exercises.
SPACE-SAVING SOLUTION: The heavy-duty rack maintains a compact footprint while securely holding all dumbbell weights, keeping your workout area tidy and equipment easily accessible.
VERSATILE TRAINING: The dumbbell and rack set is ideal for strength training, HIIT, and full-body workouts at home, in gyms, or outdoors.
Note: A light protective oil coating is applied to prevent oxidation. New rubber dumbbells may have a slight temporary odor that will dissipate with use.
